product_name: Arc'teryx Alpha SL Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: The men's super-lightweight Arc'teryx Alpha SL Rain Jacket for climbers and alpinists is made with waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX(R) for emergency storm protection that packs down small. GORE-TEX PacLite(R) fabric packs compactly and is windproof, waterproof and breathable. Durable water repellent finish enables light precipitation to bead up and roll off. Trim fit improves your line of vision to see the gear on your harness. Helmet-compatible StormHood(TM) features 1-handed cinch cords and moves with your head so it doesn't block your vision. WaterTight(TM) front zipper with flap increases weather protection; single external zippered pocket. 2-piece HemLock(TM) inserts work with hem drawcord to prevent jacket from slipping out from underneath your harness. Arc'teryx Alpha SL Jacket for men comes with a stuff sack with a clip-on webbing loop so you can attach it to your pack or harness.
short_description: The men's super-lightweight Arc'teryx Alpha SL Rain Jacket for climbers and alpinists is made with waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX(R) for emergency storm protection that packs down small.
